title: The Returner Switches Job To Hunter - Novel Updates
tags: Dungeons   Former Hero   Gate to Another World   Hunters   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Returning from Another World   Special Abilities   Strong to Stronger
author: 백결
description:
I've been summoned to another world as a hero.

After eleven years, when I returned home, they told me that the gates were open.

'Take it out.'
'What?'
'The Holy Sword.'

'I've been struggling to make contact with Laevatein in the modern era...' said Lee HyunBin, the hero who is now a hunter... has returned. 
>
